scripts.bundle:android:debug: yarn set:env:debug && npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev true --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle
scripts.bundle:android:release: yarn set:env:release && npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle
scripts.bundle:ios:debug: yarn set:env:debug && npx react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev true --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.bundle:ios:release: yarn set:env:release && npx react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.build:ios:debug: yarn bundle:ios:debug && cd ios && xcodebuild ARCHS=arm64 ONLY_ACTIVE_ARCHS=NO -workspace dingureuReactNative.xcworkspace -scheme dingureuReactNative -configuration Debug -skip-testing dingureuReactNative
scripts.build:ios:release: yarn bundle:ios:release && cd ios && xcodebuild ARCHS=arm64 ONLY_ACTIVE_ARCHS=NO -workspace dingureuReactNative.xcworkspace -scheme dingureuReactNative -configuration Release -skip-testing dingureuReactNative
